Berelduin Shondar, nicknamed Bereld the Just, was a human cleric of Helm in the midâ€“14 century DR.
By 1358 DR and through 1367 DR, he was the High Watcher of the Helms Shieldhall temple in Elturel, ruling over twenty-one priests and eighty-five followers.
He also led patrols of the Hellriders, as many as the High Rider Lord Dhelt did.
Patriarchal and stern, Berelduin ran the temple with an iron hand. He was belligerent and aggressive in defense of the Helmite faith.
